cast.title: The Cove
cast.overview: The Cove tells the amazing true story of how an elite team of individuals, films makers and free divers embarked on a covert mission to penetrate the hidden cove in Japan, shining light on a dark and deadly secret. The shocking discoveries were only the tip of the iceberg.

cast.title: Minds in the Water
cast.overview: A surfer travels the world on a quest to save dolphins.

cast.title: Chasing Ice
cast.overview: When National Geographic photographer James Balog asked, “How can one take a picture of climate change?” his attention was immediately drawn to ice. Soon he was asked to do a cover story on glaciers that became the most popular and well-read piece in the magazine during the last five years. But for Balog, that story marked the beginning of a much larger and longer-term project that would reach epic proportions.

cast.title: Dinosaur 13
cast.overview: Documentary about the discovery of the largest T-Rex fossil found.

cast.title: Racing Extinction
cast.overview: An unlikely team of activists and innovators hatches a bold mission to save endangered species.

crew.overview: The Cove tells the amazing true story of how an elite team of individuals, films makers and free divers embarked on a covert mission to penetrate the hidden cove in Japan, shining light on a dark and deadly secret. The shocking discoveries were only the tip of the iceberg.
crew.title: The Cove

crew.overview: An unlikely team of activists and innovators hatches a bold mission to save endangered species.
crew.title: Racing Extinction

crew.overview: From the UFC Octagon in Las Vegas and the anthropology lab at Dartmouth, to a strongman gym in Berlin and the bushlands of Zimbabwe, the world is introduced to elite athletes, special ops soldiers, visionary scientists, cultural icons, and everyday heroes—each on a mission to create a seismic shift in the way we eat and live.
crew.title: The Game Changers
